title: Nuclear War Incoming?! Why Russians Turned on Putin
description:
Putin gave Russian citizenship to Edward Snowden. But is it all a distraction from Russian soldiers turning on Vladimir Putin? We explain why! We also present a tale of two crimes. See if you spot the difference. And what the deuce is "Deconstructing Karen"? #Russia #Snowden #putin 

Come See Standup! - http://www.louderwithcrowder.com/tour

NEW MERCH! https://crowdershop.com/ 

GET TODAY'S SHOW NOTES with SOURCES: https://www.louderwithcrowder.com/putin-snowden-show-notes
